summary: Will Henry is a newly single graphic novelist balancing parenting his young twin daughters and a classroom full of students while exploring and navigating the rich complexities of new love and letting go of the woman who left him.
cast: Jemaine Clement|Aundrea Gadsby|Gia Gadsby|Nancy Eng|Samantha Posey|Stephanie Allynne|Michael Chernus|Celia Au|Paul Castro Jr.|Jason DarkChocolate Dyer|Jessica Williams|Regina Hall|Matthew Maher|Dionne Audain|Derrick Arthur|Gavin Haag|Catherine Cain|Charles Cain|Jordan Edmondson|Brandon O'Neill|Kiowa Smothergill|Juliana Starkey
title: Personas, lugares y cosas
